info.name: Discord Rebirth (Dark)
info.description: A Cozy Modern Customizable Dark most time ever spent on kind of theme. 98% of the theme darkened like it should of been. Over 1,000 lines of CSS.
info.additionalInfo: Is it fully finished? Most of it yes still adding some minor changes to it. MOST if not all the theme is darkened. Discord Reborn: https://userstyles.org/styles/125848/discord-reborn BetterDiscord Docs: Documentation DiscordApp Version: Github
